title: HELP ME FAST ;/ SOS
body: i can't log in to my account  !!  , i have tried everything, i changed my password EVERYTHING. and when i tried to log in to the boards to make this post it says  it cannot find any username associated with this account and region ://// what is going on?  (this is  my other account)

replies.body:
Are you still seeing this issue? If so, you'll want to submit a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) so one of our specialists can reach back out and work with you to sort this all out.

If you have any other questions, hit me up.
=// many  people have this problem today :/ the shit is i can't even log in to boards /support center, i had to log in with my old account (this)

Same situation for me. Try the account name recovery. It gives you the region.

When I login in client, I get "Transfered to another region" even with new password, known user name and known region. It is strange.
